explains: v. 使跛足，使残疾，使伤残；严重毁坏或损害；给……造成严重问题（cripple的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: They tried to avoid looking at his grotesque face and his crippled body.
sentences.cn: 他们尽量不去看他那丑陋的面庞和残疾的身躯。

sentences.en: The accident crippled him for life.
sentences.cn: 这次意外事故使他终生残废。

sentences.en: He was crippled by polio as a child.
sentences.cn: 他幼年患过小儿麻痹症，结果腿就瘸了。
